Based on 30 reviews

Roger Kirk

15:10 21 Jan 20

Used Neal and Paul for twenty years. Both for business and private residential work. Always professional and helpful... with a huge depth of knowledge. If you have any property related queries be they commercial or residential I recommend giving them a quick call.read more

Lesley Wright

11:42 19 Jan 20

I’ve worked with Paul and Neal for over 20 years and have always found them to be reliable, trustworthy and extremely... professional in every way. They have managed property for me and also found me excellent tenants. I would highly recommend them.read more

Shane Marsh

15:13 17 Jan 20

Have known Paul and Neal for many years and they have always been helpful, polite and professional. They have a wealth... of knowledge and experience and are well respected amongst people we deal with. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them.read more

Ken Marsh

10:18 17 Jan 20

I was looking for a place ASAP the viewing was arranged straight away and the paperwork was done quickly and... painlessly. The one small problem I’ve had in the time I’ve been in was dealt with efficiently. I would definitely recommend.read more

Carl Concannon

16:22 16 Jan 20

Well where do I start. From the first enquiry to the viewing to the present day, Paul, Victoria, and ALL the office... staff have been very amiable. Yes we had a few tiny teething problems but nothing was the fault of the letting agents, and all faults were speedily dealt with. Any questions we asked was answered honestly and promptly. The staff are very friendly and helpful and our dealings with Paul have always had a good and positive response. In all honesty this is one of the best lettings company in the area.read more

8 Cooke Street, Bentley, Doncaster, DN5 0BH

Investment FOR SALE

• Multi let commercial investment

• Well located

• Parking

• Workspace vacant

• Total rental: £18,640 p.a

• ERV: £27,040 p.a

Asking Price £250,000

Location

The property is part of an established commercial site close to the village centre. Cooke street runs parallel to the busy High Street of Bentley, the A19 which is one of the main routes north out of Doncaster..

Description & Accommodation

On the first floor: A well established performing arts group are tenants of the studio and offices.

On the ground floor: Tenanted offices and store. Separate workshop, previously used as a recording studio is vacant.

On site parking.

Please see Particulars below for schedule of rents.
